Reviews.Title: Good Phone and great speed
Reviews.Author: Adobe Master
Reviews.Content: The phone is amazingly smooth and clean fresh new UI. Smoother than a Galaxy S3 with Android. I suspect its because windows phone is C++ while android is Java. Whatever the reason there is no denying this single core outdated phone runs smoother than galaxy a S3.Any store that states the phone does not come with warranty you know its not really new even if its factory sealed in perfect new condition.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone
Reviews.Author: Rey
Reviews.Content: I saw reviews stating that the phone was locked or accessories were missing, so I was a little hesitant, but went ahead and bought it anyway. Luckily the cell phone is in fact unlocked and all accessories were included, also the driving and texting can wait sticker was there. I am very impressed on how thin this cell phone is and how fast it is, there is no lag at all.The camera takes awesome outdoor pictures, I mean I own a Samsung TL105 camera and cannot tell the difference. Battery life is good; after 12 hours I still have 66% left (no GPS, blutooth and batery saver on).Had to manually change the APN in order to get internet service running.I very satisfied and still have not found any cons so far.

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Elisha Watts
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and I love it my old phone dropped calls wouldn't ring glad I have this one

Reviews.Title: Not Sure
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: The product came with an issue. The hardware did not mach the IMEI label on the cover of the phone, the phone bought was an i937, but the whited out model was that of an older Windows Mobile Devices, the IMEI label on the phone was a sticker and not original OEM. The device had glitches and the camera was in operable.

Reviews.Title: Just as i expected!!
Reviews.Author: Elleb1
Reviews.Content: Former Iphone user and not sorry about the switch. Its fast has plenty of apps. The sound and picture quality are as good as the iphone if not better.

Reviews.Title: I dislike this seller
Reviews.Author: Mavis Bekoe
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived locked even though they stated locked and all attempt to get the seller assist me to resolve issues on the phone proved futile. I am beginning to think the phone is stolen. New buyers watch out.

Reviews.Title: Is this a LEGAL item?
Reviews.Author: John A. Hart
Reviews.Content: Functionalty is good - in fact, as expected. BUT, I have serious issues regarding the discrepancy with the IMEI number. This unit is showing up as a Blackberry unit, plus the IMEI number accessed via the keypad is "00000000000". I am communicating with the supplier but I think that Amazon should be aware of this and step in to do something about it. Changing the IMEI number of a cellphone is ILLEGAL in some countries and the resaons for so doing are suspicious to say the least.

Reviews.Title: samsung focus s
Reviews.Author: Vano
Reviews.Content: i liked this phone, not bed, good. thanks. but if worked this phone win8.0 then it would be excellent.  !

Reviews.Title: could b beter
Reviews.Author: des
Reviews.Content: It doesn't do all the things I expected being a windows phone  i dislike the not being able to get my free games like candy crush and pet rescue like on my old phone

Reviews.Title: Android who/what?
Reviews.Author: bj
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this phone. Has all the features, thin, fast and takes great pictures. Limited apps in marketplace ,however i'm not a big apps user. Great looking layout and easy to use. Easy able to connect to all of your Microsoft software such as Outlook, and Xbox live. Would recommend to all users of Windows phones!

Reviews.Title: Good no-contract phone
Reviews.Author: MCB
Reviews.Content: It works well for talking, pictures and web surfing. If you like Windows 7 Phones, this one is a solid choice at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Focus s i937 8mp camera is Not good as 5mp on Focus i917
Reviews.Author: Ganesan Ponraj
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone only for its 8mp camera. But the camera performance is more horrible than 5mp camera on i917. I am planning to buy another phone for real 8mp camera, likely HTC 8x.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: jiovanni fusco "Jiovanni Fusco"
Reviews.Content: This was my first Windows Phone and I love it.Pros:Excellent batteryNice screenDurableCons:Lack of appsI would recommend a Windows 8 Phone there so much better and its has all the apps you need.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Nate C.
Reviews.Content: I never used a Windows phone before, but after trying it out for the first time I loved the OS. If you dont have ATT and use a SIM card from another carrier the MMS will not work., but after awhile I gave up on trying to get it to work and purchased a newer version of the windows phone and loved using it. If you have never tried a Windows phone then definitely look into it.

Reviews.Title: Short battery life
Reviews.Author: Annette Cooper
Reviews.Content: I love it. It is beautiful but the battery that I got must be faulty because I get only two hours of functionality then I need to recharge, that's a real deal breaker. However it is a sweet phone and looks great. I will try to get another battery to see if that is the problem. If that is in fact the problem then the phone would get 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Not the phone for a man on the go in a blue collar environment.
Reviews.Author: The good, the bad and the ugly
Reviews.Content: This phone is half the build quality of its predecessor the Focus Flash. Plastic housing, plastic cover, lasted a month before the screen was inoperative. Not due to damage either, too much flex in the plastic body, superficial cracked screen in the LCD display, not on the surface though. Took it out of my pocket and that is what I got. Nice phone if your are a female that is going to lug it around in a purse, but not for a man who is going to put it in his pocket. Get the Flash instead, I have had one for 3 years, been dropped from two stories onto concrete, has hit the pavement a couple dozen times, swimming in mud holes. Takes a licking and keeps on ticking. My advice is to not buy this phone, nice phone, nice features, terrible build quality with no durability. Reminds me of an iPhone, first time you drop it on the floor, its shot. Samsung says "not a warranty matter", did not expect they would find it any other way. To me it is a classic case of defect in material which should be a warranty matter.

Reviews.Title: its good
Reviews.Author: vipulkumar bhalara
Reviews.Content: its good handy slim light....windows need  more work to be  done,after which it will be perfect. no doubt it.

Reviews.Title: A great buy
Reviews.Author: Tarah Mayers
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my son and he totally loves it and it was a great price.. The windows OS is awesome and works wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: Great so far.
Reviews.Author: standswith
Reviews.Content: I researched phones extensively and this one has proved to be a great choice  Well made and the windows OS has served well.

Reviews.Title: the phone did not come unlocked
Reviews.Author: Ma. Isabel Esquetini G.
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived but it did not come unlocked. I actually bought it to use it in my country and it does not work. I wrote Amazon and they told me to call Samsung. I made the international call but at Samsung they told me they could not help me with this.. I should contact AT&T; or Amazon. I had bought a pair of these phones before for my sister and father and they worked perfectly but this one in particular came locked.

Reviews.Title: Its unlocked and works fine
Reviews.Author: Juan Nuques
Reviews.Content: Happy to say that the phone is great the only thing is that no headphones in the box. Brand new with stickers and no problems.

Reviews.Title: A great buy and a great seller
Reviews.Author: Abednego Dee
Reviews.Content: I love the phone. It has everything that I want in a phone and more that I do not care for. It is easy to use and easy to fine instruction video in youtube. What I really love is the customer service. The phone was not unlocked when I received it. One email to the seller and it was done. But then it still was not working. The seller worked with me until the problem was resolved. It was discovered that the phone was made for AT&T; and AT&T; has a special code put on it. It was removed and the phone began to work. Great customer service Northamericamobile. You are highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Steiner Sellers
Reviews.Content: Be aware that if you buy this device it will be MOSTLY operable with any carrier.  MMS messaging will NOT work unless using an older and now discontinued Straight Talk AT&T; sim or other sim that has never lapsed and uses http://mmsc.cingular.com as the MMSC.  The MMSC setting is autoconfigured in the phone's firmware so you CANNOT change it and if you do it will immediately revert back to http://mmsc.cingular.com.  Samsung's latest update also removed any ability to work around this by using a different xml file.  Be aware that even if you purchase a way overpriced old stock Straight Talk AT&T; sim card that MMS still will not work because when a new Straight Talk sim card is activated it uses a new MMSC, http://mmsc.tf.net.

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone for the price
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: I got this unlocked from Amazon for less than $200. For that price this phone is excellent. My only complain is that Samsung has not yet released Windows Phone 7.8 for this device.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Samsung focus should i937
Reviews.Author: justice ankomah
Reviews.Content: The hardware was goodthe speed was okayspeakers was loud enoughI think it was to my surpriseI recommend it to any one who needs a windows phone

Reviews.Title: It works just fine for me.
Reviews.Author: AryJackie
Reviews.Content: The phone itself is nice, it's everything I was expecting. I'm having just setbacks with Windows Phone, it's not that compatible in general.

Reviews.Title: misleading offer. but good phone
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: the phone is very nice, super fast, big screen, weighs nothing, great pictures and videos, to windows phone apps missing. for example in Venezuela only has application to one bank. the trouble is that the battery does not last one full day unless you give very little use.The big problem I had is with the seller, since the publication says it is a unlocked phone, and it is not so! I had to make an additional charge to use it in my country.

Reviews.Title: Great overall but would have liked to know re. no accessaries included
Reviews.Author: anthony ali
Reviews.Content: Recommend to all BUT ask what accessories come or don't come with the item. Phone in condition stated. I received just the phone, no charger...which I would normally assume at least the charger would be included. Probably my fault for not asking which is why I still give a high rating.

Reviews.Title: Data Service Does Not Work With ULTRA
Reviews.Author: Tom Fisher
Reviews.Content: So far I have mixed feelings about this phone. I am using it with ULTRA cellular and cannot get the data service to work. Voice and texting work normally, ULTRA tells me that the phone may only be "partially unlocked" but I cannot verify this until next month when I will try Simple Mobile as suggested by the seller.

Reviews.Title: samsung s is the best window phone 7.5
Reviews.Author: juan carlos marquina
Reviews.Content: the model, weight, style and windows 7.5 are perfect!!! its screen is soft and the free aplications run better in this windowsphone 7.5

Reviews.Title: This phone is very different
Reviews.Author: wx768
Reviews.Content: I like this phone, it gave me a surprise. I planned to buy it to my mom, but I used it finally. I think the production's quality is very good, but the apps for windows phone is not as much as ios system's. The seller is very nice. The phone I recived is not unlocked at first, It is unlocked by using the unlocked code which I got from seller after I contacted with them. The experience of using windows phone is different with others. I think this phone is different, I like to try new things.
